name: Texas Toss
description:
A new twist on an old favorite - chip chucking at it's very finest! A texas hold'em poker game with less luck and more skill, toss your chips (cards) into the target area to alter the five shared cards - Play is as simple as a flick of your finger - stopping is a whole other matter... no one can flick just one chip...

Includes two games, Colors and Poker - choose your challenge. Fun for kids of all ages.

Retina graphics support for iPhones and iPads.
